name: Don't Wander Off
description:
Short walking simlator, around 5 minutes long, spooky atmospheric light thriller.

This was a quick game to make, this game was inspired by one liminal space image from a little friendly "competition" (not really a competition) hosted by Shookey, you supposed to edit one image but im bad at photoshop.

This is more of a proof of concept BUT there is a way bigger and better game in the works, so follow me on twitter, sometimes i post updates.
